entry.def: The interplay between two or more things or people is the way that they have an effect on each another or react to each other.

example.ex: ...the personal interplay between great entertainers and a live public.
example.tran: 演艺巨星与现场观众之间的直接互动

example.ex: ...the interplay of political, economic, social and cultural factors.
example.tran: 政治、经济、社会及文化因素之间的相互作用
